description:
An Aragami is leaving its skin on buildings while Momiji and Kusanagi are both having a hard time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can You Feel It? I Can`t Ignore It! An Ominous Premonition of Catastrophe!
Kanjiru?! Ki ni Naru! Hakyoku no Yokan!!
Peux-tu le sentir ? Je ne puis l’ignorer ! Une prémonition catastrophique !
感じる?! 気になる! 破局の予感!!
